data.title: Philips Project
data.meta_description: Philips Project - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document provides an overview of the personal care industry in India and globally. It discusses key players in the hair care and shaving/grooming space, including Cornair, Babybliss, Remington, P&G, Braun, Gillette and Panasonic. It also provides an in-depth focus on Philips as the global market leader in electric shavers, outlining their product range and strategies to drive growth and innovation.
